extendedInfo.description: +++ FULL VERSION AVAILABLE ON THE MARKET +++*** [FEATURES +4 CHALLENGES AND BLOOD FX] ***Your gift to Santa Claus: Turn the festival of love tothe feast of the blows. Here those can take revenge on the Bearded, whom the stress of Christmas has under control. Lousy gifts, explosive atmosphere, annoying family and commerce till vomiting. There's only one thing: cutting up a plan to relax.

reviews.title: Retarded
